channel.title: Okta Integration Network (OIN) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Integration Network (OIN) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 353 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: An introduction to the OIN, what it is, what an integration is, different types of integration in the OIN, differences between OIN Manager and OIN Wizard, why publish to the OIN at all? Lists reasons why people / ISVs should care about publishing on the OIN in the first place.

item.title: The OIN Value Proposition
item.description: The OIN value proposition Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 896 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Discuss the value of the Okta Integration Network to an ISV Why is this here?: Requested by Rob Nicolo Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic.

item.title: Use case category requirements
item.description: OIN Use case category requirements Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 853 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: Basically, the existing OIN prereqs page minus the OIN limitations page, which is being split out into its own page - “Review the OIN Restrictions” Page type: Reference Content type: Lookup lists and tables

item.title: Use case examples
item.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 368 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: Real-world scenarios or case studies showing how the product can be used effectively. Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Docs on use case scenarios Use cases Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs
